i have the exact same version and ive been through it and completed it on original r4. this patch works perfect and i didnt get black screen once from starting it. and as for the language. most of it is in english, just the pokedex and very few unneeded conversations are still in japanese.
All you guys should write down,what card you tested it with and what firmware.
